participant_1.background:
I work as a teacher and love my job.
I have two dogs who are like my babies.
I am a mother.
One child has autism.

participant_2.background:
I have been in a relationship for 2 years.
I work at a daycare.
I am a college student.
My major is in business administration.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, watch movies, and go to concerts.
Oh, I love video games too! What are some of your favorites?
I love the Legend of Zelda series, the Final Fantasy series, and the Kingdom Hearts series.
I love those games too! I'm also a big fan of the Super Mario series and the Pokémon series.
I love those games too! I'm really looking forward to the new Pokémon games coming out this year.
Me too! I'm so excited to see what they're going to do with the new Switch console.
I'm sure they'll do something amazing. Nintendo always does a great job with their games.
I agree. They're one of my favorite video game companies.
Me too. I'm really glad that we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves the same things you do.
I agree. It makes for a great conversation.
